data.name: BicepConfigCustomSettingsFoundFormatMessage
data.value: Custom bicepconfig.json file found ({0}).
data.comment: message to indicate that a custom settings file was found {0} is the file location

data.name: BicepConfigNoCustomSettingsMessage
data.value: No bicepconfig.json found for configuration override.

data.name: AdminUsernameShouldNotBeLiteralRuleDescription
data.value: When setting an adminUserName property, don't use a literal value.

data.name: EnvironmentUrlHardcodedRuleDescription
data.value: Environment URLs should not be hardcoded. Use the environment() function to ensure compatibility across clouds.

data.name: InterpolateNotConcatFixTitle
data.value: Use string interpolation: {0}.

data.name: InterpolateNotConcatRuleDescription
data.value: Use string interpolation instead of the concat function.

data.name: LinterDisabledFormatMessage
data.value: Linter is disabled in settings file located at {0}
data.comment: {0} is the location of the settings file

data.name: LinterRuleExceptionMessageFormat
data.value: Analyzer '{0}' encountered an unexpected exception. {1}
data.comment: string format to display error exception thrown in Linter Rule

data.name: NoUnnecessaryDependsOnRuleDescription
data.value: No unnecessary dependsOn.

data.name: NoUnnecessaryDependsOnRuleMessage
data.value: Remove unnecessary dependsOn entry '{0}'.
data.comment: Text for linter rule error. {0} is a programmatic expression

data.name: NoHardcodedLocationRuleDescription
data.value: Resource location should not be hard-coded.

data.name: NoHardcodedLocation_LocationMustBeTypeString
data.value: Location parameter must be of type 'string'.

data.name: NoHardcodedLocation_LocationMustBeTypeString_FixDescription
data.value: Change parameter type to string

data.name: NoHardcodedLocation_DoNotUseDeploymentOrResourceGroupLocation
data.value: Use a parameter named `location` here instead of '{0}'. '{0}' should only be used as a default for parameter `location`.

data.name: NoHardcodedLocation_LocationDefaultInvalidValue
data.value: The default value for the location parameter must be resourceGroup().location, deployment().location or 'global'.

data.name: NoHardcodedLocation_ModuleLocationNeedsExplicitValue
data.value: The '{0}' parameter for module '{1}' should be assigned an explicit value.

data.name: NoHardcodedLocation_ResourceLocationShouldBeExpressionOrGlobal
data.value: A resource location should be either an expression or the string '{0}'. Found '{1}'
data.comment: {0} = programmatic string value, e.g. 'global. {1} = programmatic string value, e.g. 'westus'

data.name: ParameterMustBeUsedRuleDescription
data.value: No unused parameters.

data.name: ParameterMustBeUsedRuleMessageFormat
data.value: Parameter "{0}" is declared but never used.

data.name: SecureParameterDefaultFixTitle
data.value: Remove insecure default value.

data.name: SecureParameterDefaultRuleDescription
data.value: Secure parameters should not have hardcoded defaults (except for empty or newGuid()).

data.name: SimplifyInterpolationFixTitle
data.value: Remove unnecessary string interpolation.

data.name: SimplifyInterpolationRuleDescription
data.value: Remove unnecessary string interpolation.

data.name: UnusedVariableRuleDescription
data.value: No unused variables.

data.name: UnusedVariableRuleMessageFormat
data.value: Variable "{0}" is declared but never used.

data.name: UseStableVMImage
data.value: Virtual machines shouldn't use preview images.

data.name: UseStableVMImageRuleFixMessageFormat
data.value: Virtual machines shouldn't use preview images. Use stable version in imageReference property "{0}".
